attributes.action: please discourage the use of the word "Anglo"  to refer to anyone in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...as this is more specific to English people, whenever you read about a Joint Anglo-American or Anglo-French project in the works it excludes those who may identify themselves as Celts (Scots, Welsh, Cornish etc) and other types of background. 

I suggest we use the word "British" instead. 

British is NOT a bad word!
